title: Wifey
description: WIFEYis tired of chicken on Wednesdays and sex on Saturdays. This morning the mysterious motorcycle flasher revealed himself toWIFEYand brought her frustrations into rigid focus!WIFEYsees her wildest fantasies taking flight, andWIFEYhas an itchy -- and uncontrollable urge to catch up with them!
author: Judy Blume
